channel.title: âž˜Dig Archive
channel.description: An archived collection of digitized media art, text, zines, videos, and other saved works from around the net, and beyond.

item.title: Practical Retrofitting for Obsolete Devices - Bridging the gap with old tech to create alternative interaction paradigms and workflows
item.description: A paper on re-using and adapting old technology (phones, cameras, audio players, etc) to make them usable again in the age (and in contrast to) the smartphone and cloud-enabled devices.
